abilityText:
At the end of the turn, put a deadlock counter on this monster if it doesn't already have one. If it does, remove the deadlock counter instead.

While this monster has a deadlock counter on it, your opponent must [-] an additional card when performing a switch action.
promiseDescription: Strike fear in your opponent when Phantomaton switches in to an advantageous matchup! Watch the enemy monster squirm when the cost of switching out is too high.
